entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is mentioned as someone Harry knew longest, excluding Aberforth himself.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a newspaper that published an interview by Rita Skeeter.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is mentioned as the journalist who gave an interview about Dumbledore in the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being involved in the Dark Arts when he was young, according to Rita Skeeter's interview.

entities.name: elphias doge
entities.description: Elphias Doge is mentioned as someone who was interviewed by Rita Skeeter and became rude towards her.

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter's interview was published in the Daily Prophet.
Rita Skeeter interviewed Elphias Doge for her article.
According to Rita Skeeter's interview, Dumbledore was involved in the Dark Arts when he was young.
Elphias Doge became rude towards Rita Skeeter during her interview.
